:orphan:



.. _sphx_glr__auto_examples:

========
Examples
========

Some examples for various models. 


.. raw:: html

    <div class="sphx-glr-thumbcontainer" tooltip="The classical Vicsek model in a square periodic domain `is known &lt;https://arxiv.org/abs/0712.20...">
